page.title: 02PAULL,A VILLAGE NEAR HEDON
page.content: {Paull}is a small village two miles south east of{Hedon}.It is situated on the banks of the River Humber near the mouth of Hedon Haven.{Paull}has a population of 740 people.Most of these people cannot find employment in{Paull because there is only one small shipyard offering jobs,because of this most people find employment at{Saltend or in{Hull.Paull}is a small centre of local tourism,which the people of{Hull and{Hedon}visit to enjoy the lovely views of the River Humber and the fishing along the foreshore.There is only one building of real interest in{ {Paull,}this is a small disused lighthouse which is being renovated and turned into a normal domestic dwelling house.
